s: ^Hey Rashad! Wanted to check in and see how the library corner set up is going.
^Hi Rashad. How is set up for the party going?

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "It's going well, we have some exciting things planned, you'll have to wait and see them at the party this weekend though."

s: ^I am looking forward to it. The library corner has such an impactful presence in this town, I think everyone is going to be happy to see it.
^I'm helping Lila right now with something for this weekend as well. Do you know what kind of equipment is needed for a speaker event?

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "I hope so, and I wish I could keep it up after the event, but there are some other things I still need to put time into before I can get back to that project."
^Rashad?Smiling "Maybe eventually it can become a staple again when I have more time."

s: ^I hope I can help you more with that. How is your family doing?
^I think Lila can relate! She actually just found the time to start working on a project she's passionate about. Do you know what equipment a speaker event needs?

Chat3: ^Rashad?Smiling "The kids are great, blah blah. ___ is great too, we've been alternating days of more and less time with the kids since we both have slightly flexible jobs,"
^Rashad?Smiling "and it's definitely helped the family dynamic as a whole."

s: ^Good to hear. I'm working on a youth initiative right now with Lila actually, and I think I could use your help with equipment for a speaker event.
^That's great! By the way, do you know if the library has the equipment needed to set up a speaker event?

c-0: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hmm, it's been a little while since I set one up, but "
c-1: ^Rashad?Neutral "Hmm, it's been a little while since I set one up, but "

Explain1: ^Rashad?Neutral "usually these days they need a mic, a speaker set up if the venue doesn't have one, possibly a podium, and a projector to display slides that go along with the talk."

s: ^Lila has the community center rec room for the night of the Block Party. Do you know how to set that up?
^At the community center. It sounds like you've set up speaker events before?

Explain2: ^Rashad?Neutral "Yeah, I used to run speaker events at an outdoor venue in the park."

s: ^Oh! Lila also asked if someone could help her set up activities for the event, and the equipment.
^Cool! Lila's looking to engage people during this event, so she needs someone to help with ideas for activities.

Suggestion1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Ok so I might be able to get this equipment from a local rental place I know. One of my librarians could also maybe come and help set up."
^Rashad_Day 1_A librarian can help you set up the event, and the local electronics store could rent you the equipment

Suggestion1.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_A librarian can help you set up the event, and the local electronics store could rent you the equipment

s: ^I'm not sure if she has the budget for that, is there any other way?
^That would be great! I'll confirm with Lila and get back to you.

Suggestion2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Well, it shouldn't take too long, so I can stop by and help Lila set up."
^Rashad?Smiling "I also can look back in the library's storage area, I might still have that equipment and I'd be more than happy to lend it for a night."
^Rashad_Day 1_Rashad can help set up the event, and can lend you equipment from the library_Lila1

Suggestion2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Rashad can help set up the event, and can lend you equipment from the library_Lila1

s: ^She'll really appreciate this, thank you for offering.

Goodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "No problem, always glad to help a neighbor out!"
